extension.description:
Film Gallery Plugin

v. 1.1.2

A plugin to show window of photos with a scroll bar.

Copy Protection option - some sort of glass infront of image to block 'Image save as', needs to be enabled in plugin settings.

Usage

{filmgallery=FOLDER, WIDTH, HEIGTH, SCROLLPOSITION, FILELIST, THUMBBGIMAGE, SCROLLSIZE, THUMBWIDTH, THUMBHEIGHT, CSSSTYLE}

SCROLLPOSITION: left | right | top | bottom

FILELIST: this is optional parameter file names (names only, without path) should be separated with semicolon ;

Only first four options are required (FOLDER, WIDTH, HEIGTH, SCROLLPOSITION) the rest of the are optional

example:

{filmgallery=images/fadegallery3,400,200,right}

field.name: copyprotection
field.label: Copy protection
field.description: This will place sort of glass infront of image to do not block image saving/draging
